entry.title: Innovation is 1% inspiration, 99% perspiration.
entry.content:
Innovation: 1% inspiration, 99% perspiration

Invention is the idea, Innovation is figuring our how to make it a reality. It’s the hard work to make something valuable, feasible, sustainable and impactful.

entry.title: Ochre - A stakeholder and portfolio management tool for agile work

link.title: Ochre - A stakeholder and portfolio management tool for agile work

entry.content:
Ochre

A stakeholder and portfolio management tool for agile work.

I led the pivotal redevelopment of a portfolio and stakeholder management tool to manage and monitor a complex portfolio of tech for good projects. This included the both hands-on design and software development of the tool itself as well as design & tech leadership, plus the design and embedding of supporting processes.

entry.title: Beehive - A free funding suitability checking tool

link.title: Beehive - A free funding suitability checking tool

entry.content:
Beehive

A free funding suitability checking tool

I founded, designed and developed Beehive. It was a free funding suitability checking tool that used a funder’s guidelines, priorities and open data to produce a report that helped over 18,000+ fund seekers decide where to apply.
